posts.postText:
Hello people of Goldcraft. 
This will now be the server status thread. 
Anything regarding the server being online or offline will go here.
If you can't connect, post here as well.

Keep checking this post as this post will be edited every time the server is brought down or back up.

As of right now:   ONLINE
Im not sure but i cant join so im just gonna ask if the  server is down
Server itself is up. Mojang authentication is having problems.
What are we gonna do about the inventory wipes?
can't do very much about them.
Are we going to update the server?
